DOC.brief_summary: Aims : During last decades overweight/obesity increase markedly . They associate high risk diabetes death . Effective intervention mandatory . Following participation treatment program children/adolescents often fail reach sufficient long-term weight reduction . The present trial aim integrate telemedical support therapy improve long term outcome . Methods : All children/adolescents overweight/obesity include ( n=66 , age 13.9±2.6 year , body mass index [ BMI ] 31.2±5.4kg/m² , body mass index standard deviation score [ BMI-SDS ] 2.41±0.6 ) admit hospital 04-03/2009 . To asses physical activity eat habit electronic health technology use ( Fraunhofer-Institute ) . The system consist motion sensor integrate mobile phone ( DiaTrace ) . The system analyse kind , intensity duration physical activity eat habit .
